row.process:
! We escape characters based on Platform for java Strings ! Removes empty spaces at the beginning and the end of a string : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#)
: SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "%", "%%") : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "\", "\\") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "$", "\$") : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "`", "\`") : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Escape double-quotes : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"')
